attributes.action: Require all members of parliment to pay the same tax on perks and expences as the rest of the people of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers and MPs should be made to pay the same taxe as the people that they claim to represent, on their ministerial cars, free houses, flats and gifts just like everyone else.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
